import smtplib import os from email.MIMEMultipart import MIMEMultipart from email.MIMEBase import MIMEBase from email.MIMEText import MIMEText from email.Utils import COMMASPACE, formatdate from email import Encoders
def send_mail(send_from, send_to, subject, text, files=[], server="localhost", send_cc=[], send_bcc=[]): assert type(send_to)==list assert type(send_cc)==list assert type(send_bcc)==list assert type(files)==list
msg = MIMEMultipart('related') msg['From'] = send_from msg['To'] = COMMASPACE.join(send_to) if send_cc: msg['Cc'] = COMMASPACE.join(send_cc) msg['Date'] = formatdate(localtime=True) msg['Subject'] = subject msg.preamble = 'This is a multi-part message in MIME format.'
msg.attach( MIMEText(text, _subtype='html', _charset='utf-8'))
for f in files: assert type(f)==dict part = MIMEBase('application', "octet-stream") part.set_payload( f['data'] ) Encoders.encode_base64(part) part.add_header('Content-Disposition', 'attachment; filename="%s"' % os.path.basename(f['filename'])) msg.attach(part)
send_to = send_to + send_cc + send_bcc
smtp = smtplib.SMTP(server) smtp.sendmail(send_from, send_to, msg.as_string()) smtp.close()
